roleset.name: point out differences, measure of difference

role.descr: second item in comparison, usually prepositional

example.name: arg 1 should be a trace in these instances; otherwise, .ER
example.text: Its loss of $ 77.7 million , or $ 1.86 a share , contrasted with net of $ 68.5 million , or $ 1.58 a share , in the 1988 third quarter .

propbank.arg: Its loss of $ 77.7 million , or $ 1.86 a share
with net of $ 68.5 million , or $ 1.58 a share , in the 1988 third quarter

example.name: arg1 as subject
example.text: This contrasts with the year - ago quarter , when the company had net income of $ 11.7 million , or 45 cents a share , on revenue of $ 75.7 million .

propbank.arg: with the year - ago quarter , when the company had net income of $ 11.7 million , or 45 cents a share , on revenue of $ 75.7 million

example.name: ARG0 and ARG1 and ARG2
example.text: In his Rolling Stone interview in 1980 , Mr. Bush volunteered his abortion - rights remarks to contrast himself with his rival , Ronald Reagan .

example.name: just arg2
example.text: in stark contrast to Syrian Foreign Minister Faruq al - Shara who was pulling for a complete cut in diplomatic relations between Israel and the two Arab states that happen .

propbank.arg: to Syrian Foreign Minister Faruq al - Shara who was pulling for a complete cut in diplomatic relations between Israel and the two Arab states that happen

example.name: arg 1 as all things contrasted, and weird LOC
example.text: an extremely sharp contrast between the two countries of China and the US on the issue of tipping

propbank.arg: between the two countries of China and the US

example.name: all args
example.text: his contrast of truly oral experiential sayings with the conceptual and schematic statements about the just and the wicked

propbank.arg: with the conceptual and schematic statements about the just and the wicked

example.name: No args because of span! Watch out for these-- there're lots of 'em.
example.text: By contrast , rentals in the best retail locations in Boston , San Francisco and Chicago rarely top $ 100 a square foot .

roleset.note: CONTRAST-V NOTES: Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-2-1. (from contrast.01-v)
CONTRAST-N NOTES: Updated by Julia. Member of Vncls amalgamate-22.2-2-1. (from contrast.01-n)
watch out for instances where contrast appears in a PP with no preposition-- don't annotate these. (from contrast.01-v) lots of instances don't take any args-- see examples! (from contrast.01-n)
